| HistoryText             = The Samurai Squad were a Japanese unit of marine commandos sent to investigate the disappearance of several Japanese and American ships during [[World War II]]. Together with the [[Leatherneck Raiders (Earth-616)|Leatherneck Raiders]], they were trapped by [[Hydra (Earth-616)|Hydra]]. The two units fought alongside against Hydra, although after they had escaped the traps, they both went back to the war on opposite sides.
